Info.Title: Iron Man 2
Info.Writer: Justin Theroux (screenplay), Stan Lee (Marvel comic book), Don Heck (Marvel comic book), Larry Lieber (Marvel comic book), Jack Kirby (Marvel comic book)
Info.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle, Scarlett Johansson
Info.Plot: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 43 nominations.
